messages.diva_video_error: This video is not working or not available in your region.
messages.diva_no_multicam: Videos will appear as soon as they are published, please retry in a short while
messages.diva_videometadata_error: The video metadata are corrupted. Please try another video
messages.diva_ssai_request_error: This video is not working right now. Please disable any AdBlocker and then try again. In case this error persist please contact the Customer Care at help@diva.com
messages.diva_no_highlights_error: No key moments available at the moment. Please try later
messages.diva_adResumeTime: Your video will resume in {remTime} s
messages.diva_adResumeAt: Your video will resume after the following advertisements {cVideo}/{totVideo}
messages.diva_adblock: You need to disable AdBlock to view the content
messages.diva_highlightsmode_howto: How do you want to watch this match?
messages.diva_highlightsmode_notification_subtitl: Would you like to watch them?
messages.diva_noplaybyplay: First message will be displayed shortly after the start of the session
messages.diva_recommendation_video_autoload: Next video will start in {sec} sec
messages.diva_ecommerce_rotate_device: Rotate your screen to view the shop
messages.diva_airplay_error: Error trying to cast to AirPlay
messages.diva_airplay_forbiden_error: AirPlay cast disabled in Diva settings
messages.diva_settings_hdr_description: Disable HDR if you are experiencing problems seeing the colours in the video
messages.diva_airplay_forbidden_error: AirPlay cast disabled in Diva settings
messages.diva_cc_enlarge_description: Activate for a significant increase of the subtitles text, for better readability
messages.diva_cc_style_description: Activate to enable a darker background behind the subtitles text for increased visibility
messages.diva_accessibility_high-contrast_descrip: Turn off transparency mode if you are having trouble seeing the menu
